Name: start
Description: You bought a new Victorian era house.

Name: inside
Description: You walk into the main foyer. To your left, there's a hallway. To the right there's another hallway. In the center there's a winding staircase.
Menu A: Explore the hallway to the left
Menu B: Explore the hallway to the right

Name: property
Description: You see a barn, a root cellar, and a dilapidated well.

Name: car
Description: You are now in the car. You are a coward.

Name: leftHallway
Description: You see a locked vault and a door to the right of the locked vault.
Menu B: Try to open the door to the right
Menu C: Turn around and go back to where you started

Name: rightHallway
Description: You see a narrow servant's staircase at the end of the hallway. Along the right side, there are 2 doors.

Name: stairCase
Description: You get to a landing. There's a hallway to the left and a hallway to the right.

Name: vault
Description: The vault is now open.
Menu B: No thank you, I'm creeped out.

Name: rightDoor
Description: The door swings open.

Name: stairCase2
Description: There's a landing at the at the second floor.

Name: door1
Description: A ghost turns around and shrieks at you to get out.
Menu C: Call the ghost stinky and ugly

Name: door2
Description: You find a comfy looking bed.

Name: left
Description: You find a children's playroom.

Name: right
Description: You find a library with a bunch of dusty books.

Name: insideVault
Description: There is a recently dead body in the vault.

Name: closeVault
Description: Why would you do that? You are now trapped with a body and run out of oxygen

Name: insideRightDoor
Description: A ghost comes up and offers you tea
Menu C: Call the ghost stinky and ugly

Name: closeRightDoor
Description: You are trapped inside with a ghost.
Menu A: Have a tea party with the ghost.
Menu C: Call the ghost stinky and ugly

Name: secondFloor
Description: You find a closet
Menu C: Go back to the servant stair case

Name: goUp
Description: You find the attic. There is a ghost crying.
Menu A: Ask why the ghost is crying
Menu C: Call the ghost stinky and ugly.

Name: getOut
Description: You fall and hit your head while in a rush to get out.

Name: talkGhost
Description: The ghost was lonely and needed someone to talk to.

Name: insultGhost
Description: The ghost takes offense and kills you.

Name: nap
Description: A ghost comes in and kills you while you sleep

Name: investigate
Description: You find a strange trapdoor

Name: insidePlayroom
Description: A ghost child is rocking on a rocking horse
Menu C: Call the ghost stinky and ugly.

Name: furtherLeft
Description: You find another door. The door is unlocked.

Name: poke
Description: Why would you do that? The ghost of the body kills you.

Name: investigateVault
Description: The door slams behind you. You die

Name: takeTea
Description: The ghost is pleased and offers to live with you peacefully
Menu B: Call the ghost stinky and ugly

Name: refuseTea
Description: The ghost takes offense and kills you.

Name: ghostTea
Description: The ghost is pleased and you become great friends

Name: ghostTikTok
Description: The ghost is confused, but ultimately is amused.
Menu C: Call the ghost stinky and ugly

Name: askGhost
Description: The ghost is happy to have someone to talk to. You live peacefully as roommates

Name: computerScience
Description: The ghost is intrigued and asks to learn more.

Name: anythingElse
Description: The ghost is bored and kills you.

Name: ghostDied
Description: The ghost takes offense and kills you.

Name: acceptOffer
Description: You live a long peaceful life!
